txt.en:
'Greetings, friend, and welcome to Imladris. Are you here at the behest of the Rangers? Perhaps you would aid us in patrolling these lands.

'One of our scouts, Alphlanc, guards the Last Bridge from the Lone-lands into the Trollshaws. You should speak with her and learn how you might aid her.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: You will travel to the Last Bridge immediately when you accept this quest.</rgb>
'You were sent by Anhebir? If so, you are welcome here indeed. There is much to be done.'
'Barachen suffers the company of a dwarf...perhaps he will appreciate your company?'
'Barachen could use your aid, I am sure...though he already suffers the company of another dwarf.'
Anhebir has sent you to the Last Bridge in hopes of providing aid to the scout, Alphlanc.

Alphlanc makes her camp at the head of the Last Bridge between the Lone-lands and the Trollshaws, far to the west of Rivendell.\n\nAnhebir has sent you to lend what aid you may to the Elf Alphlanc in the western Trollshaws.
